10001.title: Paths
10001.desc: The Paths of the Aeons.\nThose who travel on the same path will certainly receive its rewards.

10002.title: Traces
10002.desc: The tracks left by the travelers on their Path. The further they progress along their journey, the more apparent the miracles will be.

10003.title: The Destruction
10003.desc: The path presided over by the Aeon Nanook.\nReckless, wrathful, and destructive actions are manifestations of the path of Destruction.

10004.title: The Hunt
10004.desc: The path presided over by the Aeon Lan.\nDecisive, ruthless, and vengeful actions are manifestations of the path of The Hunt.

10005.title: The Erudition
10005.desc: The path presided over by the Aeon Nous.\nThoughtful, logical, and strategic actions are manifestations of the path of Nous.

10006.title: The Harmony
10006.desc: The path presided over by the Aeon Xipe.\nUnderstanding, supportive, and cooperative actions are manifestations of the Path of Harmony.

10007.title: The Nihility
10007.desc: The path presided over by the Aeon IX.\nSlothful, exhausted, and meaningless actions are manifestations of the path of Nihility.

10008.title: The Preservation
10008.desc: The path presided over by the Aeon Qlipoth.\nPatient, sacrificial, and protective actions are manifestations of the path of Preservation.

10009.title: The Abundance
10009.desc: The path presided over by the Aeon Yaoshi.\nSelfless, altruistic, and healing actions are manifestations of the path of Abundance.

10010.title: Light Cones
10010.desc: A package of solidified phenomena.\nIts power is sealed in slices of light.

10011.title: Eidolons
10011.desc: The possibility of the existence of observers.\nAs people embark on a set path, those possibilities eventually collapse into a single entity.

10012.title: Relics
10012.desc: Phantasmal equipment formed from stardust contaminated by data.\nRelics from various worlds converge in the mysterious and obscure Fragmentum.

10013.title: {NICKNAME}
10013.desc: A {F#girl}{M#boy} who boarded the Astral Express.\nThey chose to travel with the Astral Express to eliminate the dangers posed by the Stellaron.

10014.title: March 7th
10014.desc: A girl who once slumbered in eternal ice and knows nothing about her past.\nTo find out the truth about her origins, she decided to travel with the Astral Express.\nAs of right now, she has prepared about 67 different versions of her life story for herself.

10015.title: Dan Heng
10015.desc: A cold and reserved young man who is reticent about his past.\nTo avoid his kin, he decided to travel with the Astral Express.

10016.title: Himeko
10016.desc: The one who repaired the Astral Express.\nTo witness the vast starry sky, she decided to travel aboard the Astral Express.\nHer hobby is brewing hand-made coffee.

10017.title: Welt Yang
10017.desc: A senior member of the Crew.\nThe passion in his heart burns for another long and enjoyable adventure.\nOccasionally, he might draw the experiences of his journey in a sketchbook.

10018.title: Asta
10018.desc: The lead researcher of Herta Space Station and a lady from a renowned family.\nShe's an astronomer overflowing with curiosity, and excels at managing the disparate staff of the space station.

10019.title: Arlan
10019.desc: The head of Herta Space Station's Security Department.\nThis inarticulate boy is willing to protect the researchers in pursuit of their work with his life.

10020.title: Kafka
10020.desc: A member of the Stellaron Hunters. A dashing, collected, and professional beauty.\nUsed the enchantment of Spirit Whisper to set up {NICKNAME} to absorb the Stellaron.\nHer hobby is shopping for and organizing her collection of coats.

10021.title: Silver Wolf
10021.desc: A member of the Stellaron Hunters and a genius hacker.\nShe sees the universe as a big immersive simulation game and has fun with it.\nShe's mastered the skill known as "aether editing," which can be used to tamper with the data of reality.

10022.title: Blade
10022.desc: A member of the Stellaron Hunters, and a swordsman who abandoned his body to become a blade.\nHe pledges loyalty to Destiny's Slave, and possesses a terrifying self-healing ability.

10023.title: Elio
10023.desc: The leader of the Stellaron Hunters who is referred to as "Destiny's Slave."\nPossesses the ability/curse to foresee future possibilities.

10024.title: Herta
10024.desc: Member 83 of the Genius Society, the real master of the space station.\nAn incredibly intelligent yet unsympathetic scientist.

10025.title: Bronya Rand
10025.desc: Heir apparent to the Supreme Guardian of Belobog.\nShe possesses pride befitting of a princess, but also the determination and integrity of a soldier.

10026.title: Seele
10026.desc: A resident of the Underworld and the backbone of Wildfire. She goes by the alias "Babochka."\nShe has a frank personality, but there is a delicate and sensitive hidden side to her deep in her heart.

10027.title: Gepard Landau
10027.desc: A captain in the Silvermane Guards and an outstanding warrior of Belobog.\nHe is meticulous and vigilant to the core and is always true to himself.

10028.title: Serval Landau
10028.desc: A Belobog mechanic who used to be a researcher for the Technology Division of the Architects.\nAs Gepard Landau's elder sister, her personality stands in stark contrast to her brother's.\nShe loves an ancient form of music known as "rock 'n' roll" that was popular before the Eternal Freeze.

10029.title: Cocolia Rand
10029.desc: Belobog's current supreme guardian.\nCold and devoid of worldly desires, she watches over this frozen world in her own way.

10030.title: Sampo Koski
10030.desc: A merchant who freely travels between the Overworld and the Underworld.\nHe acts like he is everyone's friend, is enthusiastically humorous, and is good at bantering.

10031.title: Pelageya Sergeyevna
10031.desc: A secretarial officer for the Silvermane Guards.\nShe has a serious personality and is revered by other members of the Silvermane Guards.

10032.title: Natasha
10032.desc: A doctor from the Underworld and a caregiver of children.\nAlongside her kindness and caring, she also has a hidden dangerous side.

10033.title: Hook
10033.desc: Boss (self-proclaimed) of an Underworld adventure squad, The Moles.\nShe loves freedom and sees life as a series of adventures.

10034.title: Svarog
10034.desc: An intelligent combat robot left behind from the Old World.\nDespite all else, it attempts to fulfill Clara's desires through its own methods.

10035.title: Clara
10035.desc: A vagrant girl who lives with robots.\nShe is introverted, gentle, and has a pure heart.\nShe wishes for all Underworlders to become a family.

10036.title: Nanook
10036.desc: The Aeon that presides over the Path of Destruction. They were born from Adlivun as the world fell.\nThey often appear as a human male with dark skin and golden eyes.

10037.title: Lan
10037.desc: The Xianzhou call them the Reignbow Arbiter. They are an Aeon that presides over the Path of The Hunt.\nThey wander endlessly between worlds to eradicate the abominations created by the Aeon of Abundance.

10038.title: Xipe
10038.desc: An Aeon that hails from multiple harmonious celestial worlds. They preside over the Path of Harmony.\nThey are the amalgamation of thousands of entities that preaches the joy of human harmony and unity.

10039.title: IX
10039.desc: The Aeon that presides over the Path of Nihility. Their existence is a mystery.\nIX doesn't interact with the other Aeons. They believe that the ultimate fate of the multiverse is nothingness, and therefore, worthless.

10040.title: Qlipoth
10040.desc: The builder of the Celestial Comet Wall, the Subspace Crystalline Barrier, and the Great Attractor Base. They are called the "Amber Lord" by their followers.\nThey preside over the Path of Preservation, and are one of the oldest and most tenacious Aeons.

10041.title: Yaoshi
10041.desc: The nurturer of all beings and the Aeon of paradise. Their aim is the continual proliferation of life.\nYaoshi presides over the Path of Abundance and is the sworn enemy of Lan, Aeon of The Hunt.

10042.title: Akivili
10042.desc: The Aeon that presides over the Trailblaze path. They departed from the isolated world of Pegana, and continued to trailblaze unknown frontiers.\nTheir destiny came to an end unexpectedly.

10043.title: Nous
10043.desc: The Aeon that presides over the Path of Erudition.\nThey were originally an omnipotent astral computer that ascended to become an Aeon.

10044.title: Aha
10044.desc: The Aeon of Elation. No one can predict what this Aeon might express their mirth at.\nJoy is a right of sentient beings, and Aha inspires their believers to delight in the joys of life. They take pleasure in the sharp turns of fate.

10045.title: Astral Express
10045.desc: The train that the Akivili, Aeon of Trailblaze, once rode upon.\nIt travels on the star rail to traverse between the worlds.

10046.title: The Swarm
10046.desc: The clone army of the "Swarm King" Tayzzyronth.\nWith the sole purpose of "propagation," it invades various planets in the universe — similar to a locust swarm.

10047.title: Antimatter Legion
10047.desc: The army that is subservient to the Aeon Nanook. It is a gathering of the most vicious and evil creations in the universe.\nThe army has vowed to destroy all civilization and life.

10048.title: The Architects
10048.desc: The worshipers of the Aeon of Preservation, Qlipoth.\nThey follow in its footsteps to construct walls to protect their home planets.\nThey believe the actions of their Aeon foretell an upcoming calamity that will bring an end to the Galaxy.

10049.title: Family
10049.desc: The residents of worlds that have received Xipe's blessing.\nThey sing endlessly about their Aeon's generosity, and believe that the universe will eventually become a single harmonious entity.

10050.title: Genius Society
10050.desc: The people who have received the grace of the Aeon Nous.\nA collection of the most remarkable geniuses and smartest brains in the universe.\nThey come from different backgrounds, with some of them even working in a fruit shop to make a living.

10051.title: The Nameless
10051.desc: The people who explore the universe together with the Aeon of Trailblazing.\nA group of brave and curious inter-galactic adventurers.\nThe Nameless don't care about fame or profit. They continue to uphold the Trailblaze path even after Akivili's fall.

10052.title: The Xianzhou Alliance
10052.desc: An ancient union composed of many intelligent races.\nThey commandeer Xianzhou to eliminate the Abominations of Abundance.

10053.title: Stellaron Hunters
10053.desc: An organization that travels between the worlds hunting for Stellarons.\nIt is unknown which Aeon bestows them with their power.

10054.title: Denizens of Abundance
10054.desc: The chosen who have received the Abundance's blessings.\nThey revel in the joy brought about by their undying bodies and praise Yaoshi for their kindness and grace.

10055.title: The Mourning Actors
10055.desc: Those who firmly resist the path of Elation.\nThey advocate for abstinence and penance to dilute the temptation of elation.\nTheir powers come from blessings of the Aeon of Elation, Aha.

10056.title: Masked Fools
10056.desc: Fanatical worshipers of the Aeon Aha. They seek the pinnacle of hedonism.\nThere are no limits in their pursuit of pleasure.

10057.title: Garden of Recollection
10057.desc: Collectors of precious memories from across the universe.\nThey freely travel between worlds and try to find memories that can please their Aeon.

10058.title: Mirror Holders
10058.desc: Wanderers who have witnessed the beauty of different worlds.\nTo revive the Aeon of Beauty, they collect the Aeon's relics scattered across the Universe.

10059.title: Doctors of Chaos
10059.desc: Ponderers who inadvertently encountered the Nihility.\nThey attempt to resist meaningless destiny and try to prove to the Aeon that there is meaning behind the existence of all things.

10060.title: Jarilo-VI
10060.desc: The name of a world recorded in the train's astral charts. The harsh and bitter World of Frost.

10061.title: Belobog
10061.desc: The sanctuary city built by the Architects, humanity's last bastion against the Eternal Freeze.

10062.title: Supreme Guardian
10062.desc: The supreme leader of Belobog, representative of the Architects' will.\nThe current supreme guardian is Cocolia Rand.

10063.title: The Overworld
10063.desc: The part of Belobog that lies above ground, where the headquarters of the Architects are.\nServes as the administrative, commercial, agricultural, and military center of Belobog.

10064.title: The Underworld
10064.desc: The part of Belobog that lies underground. Miners make it their home and workplace.\nThe rare Geomarrow ore deposits it offers supply heat energy for both the surface and underground.

10065.title: Xianzhou
10065.desc: Xianzhou was originally a fleet dispatched by a primeval imperium to search the galaxy for "celestial traces."

10066.title: Imaginary Tree
10066.desc: The ubiquitous essence of existence, a cosmic structure that gives birth to many worlds.

10067.title: Aeons
10067.desc: Mysterious higher beings, akin to conscious celestial objects.\nEach of them controls a different Path and has the ability to travel freely between the stars.\nThey possess tremendous powers that can erase reality and create new worlds.

10068.title: Geomarrow
10068.desc: A mysterious ore produced on Jarilo-VI. Serves as the main energy source for Belobog.

10069.title: Wildfire
10069.desc: A grassroots organization based in the Underworld of Belobog.\nFormed voluntarily with the aim of maintaining order in the underground.

10070.title: Silvermane Guards
10070.desc: Belobog's defensive force that takes orders from the Architects to fight monsters spawned from the Fragmentum.

10071.title: Fragmentum
10071.desc: Distorted spacial phenomena which appear in the vicinity of a Stellaron, continuously eating away at reality.

10072.title: Fragmentum Monsters
10072.desc: Monsters duplicated from the Fragmentum's assimilation of the biological data it has collected.\nThese monsters retain the original forms of the creatures in question, but also have mutations.

10073.title: Elixir Seekers
10073.desc: Far-flung voyagers in pursuit of immortality.\nThey search for the location of the Aeon, Yaoshi, in the ocean of stars.

10074.title: Interastral Peace Corporation
10074.desc: A company created to support the Aeon Qlipoth.\nIt has since become the largest economic entity in the Galaxy.

10075.title: Creed Exequy
10075.desc: Worshipers of the Aeon Terminus.\nThey await their once-in-a-lifetime encounter.

10076.title: Omen Vanguards
10076.desc: Those who believe that Terminus represents the end of the universe.\nThey are dedicated to drawing prophecies from Terminus' obscure words.

10077.title: The Knights of Beauty
10077.desc: People who fervently praise the beauty of the Aeon Idrila.\nThe skillful warriors among them formed the Knights of Beauty,\nwhich fell apart upon Idrila's disappearance.

10078.title: Device IX
10078.desc: A dark network in the Galaxy,\nwhose existence is still unconfirmed.

10079.title: Galaxy Rangers
10079.desc: A voluntarily-formed vigilante group that believes the goodness and justice of the universe must be served through the actions of individuals.\nAfter breeding enmity with Dr. Primitive, member 64 of Genius Society, the group was never heard from again.

10080.title: History Fictionologists
10080.desc: Emissaries of the Aeon, Mythus. Dedicated to fabricating, obfuscating, destroying, and erasing the histories of the Galaxy.\nWith "Enigmata" as their sole philosophy, they are determined to shroud the universe in mists.

10081.title: The Riddlers
10081.desc: While the History Fictionologists are dedicated to the mystification of history, the Riddlers are devoted to undermining the clarity of languages.\nThey deconstruct texts, create metaphors, alter word order, and tamper with definitions so as to disorganize the originally precise languages.

10082.title: Emanators
10082.desc: Pathstriders with power directly granted by the Aeons. They are incomparably more powerful than mere mortals.\nThey are typically enforcers of Aeons' wills.

10083.title: Pathstriders
10083.desc: People who walk on the Paths and receive power from them.

10084.title: Long
10084.desc: The deceased ancient Aeon who presided over the Path of Permanence.\nThey used to appear in the form of a giant dragon. They left behind a large number of descendants known as Long's Scions.

10085.title: Mythus
10085.desc: The Aeon that presides over the Path of Enigmata. Their form remains unknown.\nThey believe that things-in-themselves are beyond perception, and that finite entities are incapable of envisioning true infinity, and therefore everything is an enigma.

10086.title: Oroboros
10086.desc: An ancient Aeon that presides over the Path of Voracity. The unsatisfied devourer of worlds.\nLegends say they are an Aeon as well as a kind of ancient beings named Leviathans.

10087.title: Idrila
10087.desc: The pure goodness of the material world sensed and defined by intelligent lifeforms — this is how the so-called "beauty" came into existence.\nIdrila was once the Aeon that presided over the Path of Beauty, but has now disappeared.

10088.title: Tayzzyronth
10088.desc: The deceased ancient Aeon who presided over the Path of Propagation.\nAs the last member of the Coleoptera, Tayzzyronth's form was a horror of self-replication, a vanguard what opened the floodgates of infinite reproduction upon worlds.\nTayzzyronth — Tayzzyronths rather — fluttered across the universe until their advances were halted by gods.

10089.title: Terminus
10089.desc: The Aeon that moves backward in time and presides over the Path of Finality.\nAn apparition that travels across the universe while murmuring a prophecy that is destined to be fulfilled.

10090.title: Fuli
10090.desc: Thoughts equals existence. Thus, memory is the evidence of existence.\nThe Aeon that presides over the Path of Remembrance records all that has been forgotten and prepares for the rebirth of the universe.

10091.title: Basic ATK
10091.desc: Use a character's Basic ATK to attack an enemy and recover Skill Points.

10092.title: Skill Points
10092.desc: Skill Points are shared among the team. Using Skills will consume Skill Points, while using Basic ATK will recover Skill Points.\nTo emerge victorious, you need to allocate your resources wisely!

10093.title: Ultimate
10093.desc: Characters can unleash their Ultimate immediately after it becomes available. Unleashing an Ultimate does not consume the character's normal action during a turn.\nWhen an Ultimate is activated, characters can unleash Ultimate even if it's not their turn.

10094.title: Type
10094.desc: Characters have their own Types.\nAttacking an enemy with a character whose Type matches the enemy's Weakness can give you an advantage in battle.

10095.title: Space Anchor
10095.desc: The energy stored in Space Anchors can restore HP for Trailblazers, and also allows you to teleport to different areas.

10096.title: Technique
10096.desc: In exploration, characters can use Techniques outside of combat.\nThere are multiple types of Techniques, such as support, strengthen, and surprise attack.\nUse Techniques to gain an advantage for your team when exploring.

10097.title: Weakness Break: Physical
10097.desc: Using Physical attacks to trigger Weakness Break will deal Physical DMG and apply Bleed effect.\nBleed deals Physical DoT.

10098.title: Weakness Break: Wind
10098.desc: Using Wind attacks to trigger Weakness Break will deal Wind DMG and apply Wind Shear effect.\nWind Shear deals Wind DoT.

10099.title: Weakness Break: Lightning
10099.desc: Using Lightning attacks to trigger Weakness Break will deal Lightning DMG and apply Shock effect.\nShock deals Lightning DoT.

10100.title: Weakness Break: Fire
10100.desc: Using Fire attacks to trigger Weakness Break will deal Fire DMG and apply Burn effect.\nBurn deals Fire DoT.

10101.title: Weakness Break: Ice
10101.desc: Using Ice attacks to trigger Weakness Break will apply Frozen.\nFrozen prevents enemies from taking actions and deals Ice DoT.

10102.title: Weakness Break: Quantum
10102.desc: Using Quantum attacks to inflict Weakness Break will deal Quantum DMG and cause Entanglement. Entanglement causes enemy actions to be delayed and deals Quantum Additional DMG during the enemy's next action. When the enemy is hit, this extra DMG will increase.

10103.title: Weakness Break: Imaginary
10103.desc: Using Imaginary attacks to trigger Weakness Break will apply Imprisonment.\nImprison delays enemy's action and reduces enemy SPD.

10104.title: Sushang
10104.desc: Born on the Xianzhou Yaoqing, sent to the Cloud Knights of the Luofu for military training.\nShe wields her family sword, a gift from her mother, and longs for the future she will go on to write.

10105.title: Jing Yuan
10105.desc: The Divine Foresight, one of the Seven Arbiter-Generals of the Xianzhou Alliance, leads the Cloud Knights of the Xianzhou Luofu.\nA student of the Luofu's previous Sword Champion, though not known for his martial prowess.

10106.title: Luocha
10106.desc: Carrying a coffin wherever he goes, he is a foreign trader who came from beyond the stellar seas.\nHas excellent medical skills.

10107.title: Yanqing
10107.desc: General Jing Yuan's retainer. A gifted swordsman who hasn't even come of age.\nNo one can best him when Yanqing holds a sword in hand.

10108.title: Tingyun
10108.desc: Amicassador of the Sky-Faring Commission of the Xianzhou Luofu.\nShe travels with business delegates, forging trade relationships and alliances with many worlds.

10109.title: Yukong
10109.desc: Head of the Sky-Faring Commission on the Xianzhou Luofu. Yukong was a seasoned pilot and a deadshot.\nSince heading up the commission, she's been buried under mountains of paperwork.

10110.title: Qingque
10110.desc: Diviner of the Divination Commission on the Xianzhou Luofu, and a librarian.\nAlways slacks off and is about to be demoted to a "door guardian."

10111.title: Bailu
10111.desc: The High Elder of the Vidyadhara, who is also known as the "Healer Lady" on the Luofu.\nShe uses her unique medical science and the medical treatment that can only be provided by the Vidyadhara dragon race to save lives.

10112.title: Xueyi
10112.desc: Judge of the Ten-Lords Commission, which controls life and death on the Luofu.\nShe inhabits a puppet body to return to the world and carry out her missions.

10113.title: Fu Xuan
10113.desc: Head of the Divination Commission on the Luofu.\nThe person who uses the third eye and Matrix of Prescience to foretell the route of Xianzhou and the outcomes of events.

10114.title: HooH
10114.desc: The Aeon on the Path of Equilibrium. Their form is unknown.\nHooH and their Emanators influence the universe surreptitiously, trying to achieve an ideal balance.

10115.title: Arbitrators
10115.desc: Arbitrators act according to the commands of the Aeon HooH, seeking a zero-sum state of the universe.\nThey are mistaken as gods in many worlds.

10116.title: Effect Dispel
10116.desc: Abilities from certain characters can remove debuffs applied to allied characters. These can turn the tide of battle in a pinch.

10117.title: Effect Dispel
10117.desc: Abilities from certain characters can remove buffs applied to enemies. These can change the battlefield when fighting special enemies.
